net.corda.testing.node

Class MockServices.Companion

  • net.corda.testing.node.MockServices.Companion
  • Enclosing class:
    MockServices

    public static class MockServices.Companion

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Properties makeTestDataSourceProperties(java.lang.String nodeName)
      Make properties appropriate for creating a DataSource for unit tests. Defaults configuration of on-disk H2 instance. If 'databaseProvider' system property is set then creates a config from the relevant config file is present in resources folder (used to parametrize test to run against a remote database).
      java.util.Properties makeTestDataSourceProperties(java.lang.String nodeName, boolean inMemory)
      Make properties appropriate for creating a DataSource for unit tests. Defaults configuration of on-disk H2 instance. If 'databaseProvider' system property is set then creates a config from the relevant config file is present in resources folder (used to parametrize test to run against a remote database).
      NonExistentClass makeTestDatabaseAndMockServices(java.util.List<java.lang.String> cordappPackages, NonExistentClass identityService, NonExistentClass initialIdentity, NonExistentClass networkParameters, java.security.KeyPair[] moreKeys, int softLockingSqlInClauseSize)
      Makes database and mock services appropriate for unit tests.

      Makes database and persistent services appropriate for unit tests which require persistence across the vault, identity service and key managment service.

    • Method Detail

      • makeTestDataSourceProperties

        public java.util.Properties makeTestDataSourceProperties(java.lang.String nodeName)

        Make properties appropriate for creating a DataSource for unit tests. Defaults configuration of on-disk H2 instance. If 'databaseProvider' system property is set then creates a config from the relevant config file is present in resources folder (used to parametrize test to run against a remote database).

        Parameters:
        nodeName - Reflects the "instance" of the on-disk database or database username/schema. Defaults to a random string.

      • makeTestDataSourceProperties

        public java.util.Properties makeTestDataSourceProperties(java.lang.String nodeName,
                                                         boolean inMemory)

        Make properties appropriate for creating a DataSource for unit tests. Defaults configuration of on-disk H2 instance. If 'databaseProvider' system property is set then creates a config from the relevant config file is present in resources folder (used to parametrize test to run against a remote database).

        Parameters:
        nodeName - Reflects the "instance" of the on-disk database or database username/schema. Defaults to a random string.
        inMemory - Set to true to use an in-memory database rather than an on-disk database. Defaults to true.

      • makeTestDatabaseAndMockServices

        public NonExistentClass makeTestDatabaseAndMockServices(java.util.List<java.lang.String> cordappPackages,
                                                        NonExistentClass identityService,
                                                        NonExistentClass initialIdentity,
                                                        NonExistentClass networkParameters,
                                                        java.security.KeyPair[] moreKeys,
                                                        int softLockingSqlInClauseSize)

        Makes database and mock services appropriate for unit tests.

        Parameters:
        cordappPackages - A List of cordapp packages to scan for any cordapp code, e.g. contract verification code, flows and services.
        identityService - An instance of IdentityService, see MockServicesKt.makeTestIdentityService.
        initialIdentity - The first (typically sole) identity the services will represent.
        moreKeys - A list of additional KeyPair instances to be used by class MockServices.
        Returns:
        A pair where the first element is the instance of CordaPersistence and the second is class MockServices.

      • makeTestDatabaseAndPersistentServices

        public NonExistentClass makeTestDatabaseAndPersistentServices(java.util.List<java.lang.String> cordappPackages,
                                                              NonExistentClass initialIdentity,
                                                              NonExistentClass networkParameters,
                                                              java.util.Set<java.security.KeyPair> moreKeys,
                                                              java.util.Set<? extends error.NonExistentClass> moreIdentities,
                                                              net.corda.testing.internal.TestingNamedCacheFactory cacheFactory)

        Makes database and persistent services appropriate for unit tests which require persistence across the vault, identity service and key managment service.

        Parameters:
        cordappPackages - A List of cordapp packages to scan for any cordapp code, e.g. contract verification code, flows and services.
        initialIdentity - The first (typically sole) identity the services will represent.
        moreKeys - A list of additional KeyPair instances to be used by class MockServices.
        moreIdentities - A list of additional KeyPair instances to be used by class MockServices.
        cacheFactory - A custom cache factory to be used by the created IdentityService
        Returns:
        A pair where the first element is the instance of CordaPersistence and the second is class MockServices.
